ModMetaData.name: Violent Takeoff
ModMetaData.author: mr. teterew
ModMetaData.description: When I launched my gravship for the first time, I was so eager to see how exactly does it destroy the map during takeoff, but I saw.. well, I don't need to explain, you saw it too. "Is it a joke?! - I asked myself, - It's no good for me at all. I need to fix that." And a few days later this mod was born.
